moves.1. e4 h5 2. e5 Nc6 3. e6 Nf6 4. d3 dxe6: It's going to stay like this for awhile.
moves.38. Ng8 Rb8 39. Ne7 Qh2 40. Nd5 Qxh4+ 41: Please note...the monkey just made a pawn into a knight...
moves.76. Ne4 f3 77. Nd6 Rh8 78. Nc8 Kg8 79. N: And that's checkmate...in just 79 moves. Not even the longest game I've ever played...tho it sure felt like it. Lol. This is one small step for a monkey, and one giant leap for apekind. (This is how Planet of the Apes started.)

gameName: MAN V. MONKEY III - REDUX (The Actual Revenge of the Monkey)
